Name: Ancestral Recall
Rule: Draw 3 cards. Skip your next draw phase.

Name: Reminisce
Rule: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

Name: Demonic Tutor
Rule: Search your library for a card and put it in your hand, then shuffle.

Name: Eureka
Rule: Each player may put one permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. Lose life equal to its mana cost.

Name: Exhume
Rule: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.

Name: Wildfire Roulette
Rule: Each player chooses a random creature they control. Sacrifice the chosen creatures.

Name: Better Off Dead
Rule: Put a creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under target opponentâ€™s control.

Name: Equalize
Rule: The player with the highest life total loses 10 life. The player with the lowest life total gains 10 life.
